price: 98. Rends donc gloire à ton Seigneur en célébrant Ses louanges, et sois avec ceux qui se prosternent.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
